title: Husires
author: Husires
content: QuoteProposalOn March 20th 2023 we will try to get as many people as possible to place offers on Bisq as a way to kick-start liquidity and also launch the newest release. Bisq 2.0.ObjectiveReach maximum number of offers published during 1 day.If we can reach 1000 offers published on one day we will see a new high in number of trades.Please add a üëç below if you will participate!Source: https://github.com/bisq-network/growth/issues/274We all complain that DEXs have a liquidity problem, but the liquidity will not come without trying itIf you have not used Bisq before, download it now and give it a try.Some useful links:https://bisq.network/https://bisq.network/downloads/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5230289.0https://docs.bisq.network/getting-started.htmlhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5416294.0Read also Why KYC is extremely dangerous ‚Äì and useless

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: This is awesome. Will share the news and hope many more join in doing the same.Bisq is not perfect, but a fantastic project with constant development and a very well working DEX software.I want to encourage anyone reading this to try it. You can buy / sell small amounts and often get a 1 - 3% plus on the current market value for smaller amounts.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on March 03, 2023, 12:19:55 AMThis is awesome. Will share the news and hope many more join in doing the same.Bisq is not perfect, but a fantastic project with constant development and a very well working DEX software.I want to encourage anyone reading this to try it. You can buy / sell small amounts and often get a 1 - 3% plus on the current market value for smaller amounts.After the closure of LBC, I expect that some will try to look for alternatives, especially those that do not require verification of identity, and with the closure of localcrypto, the market must witness some downloads, and perhaps an increase in liquidity.It's the beginning and I hope people will continue to use it.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Never tried the platform because of some reasons but i always recommend it to anyone who are trying to make a decentralized way if trading p2p.Quote from: Husires on March 03, 2023, 01:31:30 PMAfter the closure of LBC, I expect that some will try to look for alternatives, especially those that do not require verification of identityIf the owner/management of bisq can market/promote the platform in different social media platforms, adnetwork, PR, and other community posts like this, number of traders could increase significantly due to the shutdown of similar services.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 05, 2023, 03:29:58 AMI made a similar thread like the one you have here, but I placed it in bitcoin discussion for a few reasons.There was no need to open another thread about this Bisq Market Day, and especially not in Bitcoin discussion board since this is the place for exchanges related discussions. Sure, you may get more visibility there, but you will also get more shitposts as that board is known for that.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 05, 2023, 03:29:58 AM1.) more exposure for bisq day2.) I added questions that will facilitate bitcoin and DEX discussion.Here's my thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5442878.0Thank you, good effort, but I do not think that there will be a real addition. It is true that everyone is posted in bitcoin discussions board, but they are posts for signature campaigns. You rarely find people presenting their personal experiences on that board.I'm a little busy these days, was planning to put an explanation on how to download the wallet, and then the beginners board would be appropriate.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 05, 2023, 09:35:40 PMI've been wanting to make a good quality beginners and help section topic, may I make this thread for you? Yes, you can start with it in this board Wallet software and make discussions about the quality of the topic, and after the topic is perfect, you can lock it and create a new one as a guide for beginners in Beginners & HelpSome useful topics: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5416294.0https://bisq.wiki/Trading_BSQhttps://bisq.network/blog/how-to-earn-bsq/Using these links, and some questions in the forum, you will create a good topic.I wish you success and you will get all the support from me.
